# domain-management Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    domain-management = {
      source = "myklst/domain-management"
    }
  }
}

provider "domain-management" {
  endpoint = "http://localhost:10800"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `endpoint` (String) The Domain Management server endpoint
